alert.note: Alert for Bastrop; Travis (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 6:57PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Travis and west central Bastrop Counties through 745 PM CDT... At 656 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wyldwood, or 7 miles east of Austin Bergstrom Int Airport, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Austin, Bastrop, Austin Bergstrom Int Airport, Cedar Creek, Wyldwood, Camp Swift, Hornsby Bend, Webberville, Phelan, Garfield and Del Valle. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
